@graph.name: Manaslu Circuit Trek
@graph.description: The Manaslu Circuit Trek in Nepal is a remote Himalayan trekking adventure around Mt. Manaslu, crossing Larkya La Pass with rich Tibetan culture and stunning mountain views.

priceSpecification.name: Custom pricing depending on group size and season

provider.name: Hi Nepal Travels & Treks Pvt. Ltd.

itemListElement.name: Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu (1,400m), airport pickup and trek briefing.
Day 2: Drive from Kathmandu to Machha Khola (870m), 7–8 hours.
Day 3: Trek from Machha Khola to Jagat (1,340m), 6–7 hours.
Day 4: Trek from Jagat to Deng (2,095m), 6–7 hours.
Day 5: Trek from Deng to Namrung (2,660m), 6–7 hours.
Day 6: Trek from Namrung to Sama Gaun (3,530m), 6–7 hours.
Day 7: Acclimatization day in Sama Gaun, optional hike to Manaslu Base Camp (4,800m).
Day 8: Trek from Sama Gaun to Samdo (3,875m), 3–4 hours.
Day 9: Trek from Samdo to Dharamsala (4,460m), 4–5 hours.
Day 10: Cross Larke Pass (5,106m) to Bimthang (3,720m), 8–9 hours.
Day 11: Trek from Bimthang to Dharapani (1,860m), 7–8 hours.
Day 12: Drive from Dharapani to Kathmandu (1,400m), 9–10 hours.

mainEntity.name: How difficult is the Manaslu Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Manaslu Circuit Trek is a challenging trek suitable for trekkers with good fitness and some high-altitude trekking experience.

mainEntity.name: What is the best time to do the Manaslu Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: The best time for the Manaslu Circuit Trek is during spring (March–May) and autumn (September–November) for stable weather and clear mountain views.

mainEntity.name: Do I need special permits for the Manaslu Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the Manaslu Circuit Trek requires a Restricted Area Permit, Manaslu Conservation Area Permit, and Annapurna Conservation Area Permit.

mainEntity.name: What is the highest point of the Manaslu Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: The highest point of the Manaslu Circuit Trek is Larke Pass at 5,106 meters above sea level.

mainEntity.name: Is a guide mandatory for the Manaslu Circuit Trek?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, hiring a licensed guide is mandatory for the Manaslu Circuit Trek as it is a restricted trekking region.

mainEntity.name: How many days does the Manaslu Circuit Trek take?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Manaslu Circuit Trek usually takes 12 to 14 days depending on the itinerary and acclimatization schedule.
